龙卷风图（Tornado Diagram）是在风险定量分析中采用的一种对单因素敏感性分析的工具。因其图形状像龙卷风，因此而得名。
“龙卷风走廊（tornado alley）”（Tornado Alley），是指位于北美大平原位于美国得克萨斯州西部和明尼苏达州之间的一条狭长地带，这片定义模糊的区 …
大约25%的龙卷风在龙卷风巷(Tornado Alley)形成。科罗拉多州就是其中的一部分，周一的龙卷风就在这里出现。
风暴战区（tornado force）（Tornado Force）（已正式发布，2012年3月23日终极封测）疯狂松树范特西篮球经理星战前夜.EVE Online：战火其中： …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting a violent thunderstorm of the tropical Atlantic Ocean): perhaps an alteration of Spanish tronada 'thunderstorm' (from tronar 'to thunder') by association with Spanish tornar 'to turn'

entry.def: A tornado is a violent wind storm consisting of a tall column of air which spins round very fast and causes a lot of damage.

means.word_mean: 1. a localized and violently destructive windstorm occurring over land characterized by a funnel-shaped cloud extending toward the ground
2. a purified and potent form of cocaine that is smoked rather than snorted
